ssot__LoyaltyMemberCurrency__dlm.name: Loyalty Member Currency
ssot__LoyaltyMemberCurrency__dlm.description: The Loyalty Member Currency DMO represents the value a loyalty member selects to receive, such as airline miles or points.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CurrencyTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to methods of accruing value in loyalty program, for example miles, points, or a hard currency such as US dollars.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__ExpirablePointsNumber__c.description: The number of points that expire if not redeemed.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastAccrualProcessedDate__c.description: The date when point accrual process was last run.

ssot__LastExpirationProcessRunDate__c.description: The date when expirable points were last calculated.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LastResetDate__c.description: The date when points were most recently converted to baseline value for point accrual period.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Loyalty Member Currency DMO.

ssot__LoyaltyMemberTierId__c.description: A reference ID to which tier loyalty member belongs.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to person who joined loyalty program.

ssot__NextResetDate__c.description: The date when points are changed to a baseline value for the accrual period.

ssot__PointsBalanceNumber__c.description: The current number of points available for redemption.

ssot__PointsBalanceBeforeResetNumber__c.description: The total number of points before account was reset.

ssot__TotalPointsAccruedNumber__c.description: The total number of accrued points, including expired and redeemed points.

ssot__TotalPointsExpiredNumber__c.description: The total number of expired points.

ssot__TotalPointsRedeemedNumber__c.description: The total number of points redeemed.
